thread.section_title: Business and technology news from SF Bay Area and the world - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: The technology I own, and why
thread.title_full: The technology I own, and why - San Francisco Chronicle

author: David Einstein
title: The technology I own, and why
text:
Photo: Asus The Asus Zenfone 2 has a lot of features for a low price. The Asus Zenfone 2 has a lot of features for a low price.
A fair portion of this column has dealt with shopping questions about computers, smartphones, tablets and other consumer electronics. I usually confine my answers to the technology of the hardware, and my bottom-line advice is the actual bottom line: Get the least-expensive device that meets your needs. I seldom recommend brands because computing gear has become so commoditized that comparable devices usually offer almost identical performance. The Asus Zenfone 2 has a lot of features for a low price. The Asus Zenfone 2 has a lot of features for a low price.
